item.title: Swift: Deconstruct SPF: asMechanism with Qualifier
item.description:
Hi,

In this article, I will walk through how I re-implemented the enum for Qualifier and MechanismKind. I will also deliver a working asMechanism() function. The diff is here

item.title: Swift: Deconstruct SPF - Qualifier and MechanismKind
item.description: In this article I will be looking at defining the enums for Qualifier and MechanismKind. I will also be adding tests to ensure that the functions work as expected. Further I will implement a simple asMechanism() as a proof of concept.

item.title: Swift: Deconstruct SPF: Strings and SubStrings
item.description: I have been working on my SPF project in Swift of late. As part of this I have started to deal with substrings. “A slice of a string” according to Apple Documentation. In dealing with this, I have found myself quite often converting substrings back to normal strings. Today we will look at how we can pass substrings directly by making our functions generic.

item.title: Swift: Deconstruct SPF - Struct Mechanism
item.description:
Today, I will start on building out the functionality of the struct Mechanism.
This will involve creating some tests, and basic functions.

item.title: Swift: Deconstruct SPF an Outline and Background
item.description:
What is SPF

If you have not followed my rust series on deconstructing SPF you can check it out here.

item.title: Swift: Deconstruct SPF Getting Started
item.description: In my previous series “Learning Rust”. I decided to attempt to learn some fairly basic rust concepts and constructs by working on a fairly simple project. This seemed to go fairly well. So I am now going to attempt to work on the same project, but this time, using Swift.
